page.title: 10MOTORWAY M42 CONSTRUCTION 2
page.content: After leveling, the sub base and road base are laid using bulldozers and rollers.{The base course}is the first layer of{Tarmacadamised stone}to be laid.A special machine is used to lay the hot tarmac to the correct depth and in the correct place.This surface is immediately{compressed}using heavy rollers. The final wearing surface has additional asphalt coated stones added The construction is being carried out by{Tarmac Construction Ltd.}This section is the second part of the M42 which will eventually go from {Birmingham to Nottingham.}However from {Appleby to Nottingham}the road will only be a{Trunk Road,}not a Motorway. Also the delay in starting the next section of road is causing concern in {Measham and Ashby}as residents feel more traffic will be generated,causing a decline in the quality of life.
